originalText.text:
I have been seeing Dr. Lee for quite some months now. My first experience was so wonderful. He gave me an in-depth explanation as to how the adjustment would work over time and align me well. He also took X-rays & went over them and addressed the issues I had and provided solutions for them. I had an experience of adjustment before this once, and I have to say he made me feel so comfortable and educated about how I was working towards fixing the little symptoms I usually don't care about by fixing my alignment. (I will say this after the first session it's super important to biofreeze and lay on your back straight for 20 minutes. Your spine is trying to reallign itself and stay in that position on top of stress/knotted muscles. It will hurt
you will have to ice it. But thats what makes it then better overtime)
Over the course I will say I have seen some significant results. I know some weeks when I am exhausted from traveling and need to see Dr. Lee sooner than we are scheduled for and boy does it feel better. Nonetheless, I also stretch at home everyday and try to get massages to relax my muscles and keep my posture better. As a model, I wouldn't be able to do these certain stretches/poses I pulled in these few pictures, thanks to Dr. Lee and biofreeze I am getting better one day at a time ðŸ’—

Highly recommend this practice. Everyone is so warm and welcoming here. I am so glad I found a place!

originalText.text: My family and I had the best chiropractic experience with this wonderful team of doctors. They truly consider their patients and apply detailed and individualized care. Highly recommended practice!

text.text: My family and I had the best chiropractic experience with this wonderful team of doctors. They truly consider their patients and apply detailed and individualized care. Highly recommended practice!

originalText.text: The chiropractor addresses your issues at its core and executes the adjustment with precision. This is due to the multiple instruments (X-ray and temperature reading device) used to detect precisely where your spine is misaligned. The procedure is painless and I recommend everyone to go even if you donâ€™t feel any pain or symptoms. Pain indicates that the problem was chronic and it happened way before you met with a chiropractor. I think of chiropractic care like changing oil in a car. For optimum efficiency and overall health, everyone needs to see a gonstead chiropractor regularly.

originalText.text: Dr. Choi has always given me great chiropractic care. I'm someone who has suffered a lot of back pain and he has helped me greatly improve on those issues with his treatments. I never thought I would live a day without back pain!

originalText.text: I have been to so many Chiropractors without getting any good results, until I went to Manhattan Gonstead chiropractic.  Dr. Gwangjong D. Lee is amazing!  He cares about his patient.I highly recommend him.
